Title: Our Father
Plot: In order to stop Arthur, Hiro and Clair team up and travel back in time to when Kaito gave Claire to H.R.G. Meanwhile, Peter and the Haitian head out to stop Arthur, but are stopped by Sylar and Suresh has a breakthrough with the formula.
GuestStars: Kristen Bell, Blake Shields, Jamie Hector, Breckin Meyer, Brea Grant, Seth Green, Chad Faust, Tamlyn Tomita, Robert Forster, George Takei, Jimmy Jean-Louis, Jessalyn Gilsig, Ashley Crow
